title: Two squares or not two squares
text:
Given integer n decide if it is possible to represent it as a sum of two squares of integers.InputFirst line of input contains one integer c ≤ 100 - number of test cases. Then c lines follow, each of them consisting of exactly one integer 0 ≤ n ≤ 1012.OutputFor each test case output Yes if it is possible to represent given number as a sum of two squares and No if it is not possible.ExampleInput:10
1
2
7
14
49
9
17
76
2888
27Output:Yes
Yes
No
No
Yes
Yes
Yes
No
Yes
No
sample_input:

1

49

27Output:Yes
